Package memory

package memory
A collection of interfaces that define the behaviour of a Random Access Memory object and provide additional convenience methods for reading code from RAM and writing code to RAM. Additionally, this package contains an implementation of these interfaces.
Author:
Alex Mandelias
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    CodeReader
    Extension of the RAM interface providing convenience methods for reading machine code from RAM.
    CodeWriter
    Extension of the RAM interface providing convenience methods for writing machine code to RAM.
    RAM
    Interface for a Random Access Memory object which is, in essence, responsible for storing and retrieving values.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Memory
    An implementation of the RAM, CodeReader, CodeWriter interfaces.
